statements: SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount_paid DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_payment FROM payments
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_count >= 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, payments.amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payments.amount < 500;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.transaction_amount, payments.amount FROM transactions JOIN payments ON transactions.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE transactions.transaction_amount > payments.amount;

SELECT customers.customer_name, payments.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget < 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers
SELECT promotion_name, discount_percentage FROM promotions
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN promotions ON purchases.product_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY purchase_date LIMIT 5;
